#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <functional> 
#include <math.h> 
using namespace std;


int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
        int m;
        cin>>m;
        
        vector<int> numbers;
        for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
            int n ;
            cin>>n;
            numbers.push_back(n);
        }
        
        if(m % 2 == 0)
            cout<<-1<<endl;
        else{
             sort(numbers.begin(),numbers.end());
             cout<<numbers[numbers.size()/2]<<endl;
            }
    }
}
